# JAVASCRIPT KUTUBXONALARI VA FRONT-END FREYMVORKLARI
## Authors
-   Mamatqodirov Mahammadali Author
-   Abdusalimova Muhayyo Shukurullo qizi Author
## Keywords:
Kalit so'zlar: JavaScript kutubxonalari, front-end freymvorklari, React, Angular, Vue.js, veb-ishlab chiqish, evolyutsiya
## Abstract
Annotatsiya: Ushbu maqola zamonaviy veb-ishlab chiqishda JavaScript kutubxonalari va front-end freymvorklarining ahamiyatini o'rganadi. Unda ushbu texnologiyalarning evolyutsiyasi, asosiy tushunchalari, tanlash mezonlari, afzalliklari va kelajak tendensiyalari muhokama qilinadi hamda dasturchilarga o'z loyihalarida to'g'ri qaror qabul qilishlari uchun ma'lumot beriladi.
## References
1\. Flanagan, D. (2020). JavaScript: The Definitive Guide (7th Edition). O'Reilly Media.
2\. Freeman, A., & Sanderson, S. (2021). Pro ASP.NET Core MVC 2 with JavaScript Frameworks. Apress.
3\. MDN Web Docs. (2024). Introduction to JavaScript. Mozilla.
4\. W3Schools. (2024). JavaScript Frameworks.
5\. React Documentation. (2024). React – A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Meta.
6\. Stack Overflow Developer Survey. (2023). Most Popular Web Frameworks.
Stack Overflow.
